snippet.title: Lara Croft GO - PlayStation Experience 2016: Launch Trailer | PS4, PS Vita
snippet.description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/lara-croft-go-ps4/

In Lara Croft GO for PlayStation 4 and PlayStation Vita, Lara Croft will use her wits and weapons as she delves further into dangerous chasms, filled with mystery, artifacts and peril. Featuring the ambient and zen-like music, soothing art style and didactic turn-based puzzle solving that made the game a critical and commercial success on mobile platforms last year, the PlayStation 4 and Vita versions include cross-buy and cross-saving so you can purchase and play it on both platforms without losing progress.  

www.laracroftgo.com

LARA CROFT GO ©2015-2017 SQUARE ENIX LTD. LARA CROFT and LARA CROFT GO are trademarks of Square Enix Ltd. SQUARE ENIX and the  SQUARE ENIX logo are registered trademarks or trademarks of Square Enix Holdings Co., Ltd. The ratings icon is a registered trademark  of the Entertainment Software Association. All other trademarks are property of their respective owners.
